column2: 把我将来可能用得上的东西送给别人并不总是最好的选择。我失去了§Y慷慨§!特质。
与人分享是一种快乐。我失去了§Y贪婪§!特质。
书籍是宝贵的，有关古往今来事物的知识写在它们的字里行间。这座知识的宝库将具备储存数以千计的书籍的能力，还配有配套的阅读设备。
萨摩斯的阿斯克勒庇阿得斯

[Root.GetBookThemeCap] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], that was thought to be lost forever, but was found and acquired by [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] for his Great Library.
Initially thought to be [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], it is now considered a clever forgery.
在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的护甲。
在一座神秘墓穴中发现的一位古代骑士的佩剑。
在一位古代君王的陵墓中发现的古老权杖，上面装饰着许多绿宝石。
基本上是对优良金属的浪费，打造它的铁匠当时很可能喝醉了。
一把强力但是沉重的双手剑，只有强壮的战士才能得当地使用它。
The §YTraining Academy§! in my §YAmphitheater§! possesses many well-trained young warriors. Maybe the best one out of them will make a good military commander.
Has not recruited an Academy Hero in the last 5 years.
A gladiator-trained warrior appears at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
This character trained as a Gladiator in the arena.

The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the [the_temple.GetName], they place [From.GetHerHim] on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] on top of the temple, and slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. They then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.

The priests drag [From.GetTitledFirstName] screaming to the top of the [the_temple.GetName] and they keep [From.GetHerHim] steady on the [the_sacrificial_altar.GetName] that stands there while I slice [From.GetHerHim] open with a ceremonial dagger. I then tear out [From.GetHerHis] still beating heart to the cheers of the assembled crowd.
This option is available because you have the §Y[the_sacrificial_altar.GetName]§!

A visitor to my court told me that in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName] he heard rumors that a rich merchant had acquired an unheard of [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName].

I received a letter from someone in [book_province.GetName], in the [book_province_realm.GetFullBaseName], claiming that he has in his possession a copy of [Root.GetBookThemeWithArticle] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. But that work was unknown until now!
I shall ask [possible_emissary1.GetFirstName] to go and try to acquire the book!
It is interesting news, but right now I have more pressing matters to attend to.
I actually do not care about missing books. The collection I have is enough.
You will no longer be bothered with news about lost books.

My courtier [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] returned today with the sad news that [emissary.GetHeShe] could not obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName], and is even not sure it really exists. [emissary.GetFirstName] returned the money that remained after the Journey expenses.

My Lord [Root.GetTitle]\n I [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick], your humble servant, am still trying to obtain the [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName]. \n Unfortunately I have run out of funds. Would your grace be so generous as to send me some extra money, I am almost sure to be able to find and acquire the book you seek.
I will send the money. It will be worth it!
No, it is too expensive. Let [emissary.GetHerHim] return empty handed.

I just got news that [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is staying in the court of [emissary_current_host.GetTitledNameWithNick] spending my money and with no intent of returning! And the [Root.GetBookTheme] by [Root.GetAuthorName] is nowhere to be found.
Oh no! I must be more careful choosing who to send next time.
Maybe somebody will take care of the traitor?
The traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] is no longer alive. And nobody will be able to trace [emissary.GetHerHis] death to me.
Curses! The attempt on the life of the traitor [emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick] failed, and my involvement was discovered.
Nobody betrays me and gets away with it.
[emissary.GetTitledNameWithNick]带着被认为是由[Root.GetAuthorName]所著的[Root.GetBookTheme]回来了！\n或许我应该邀请几位饱读诗书的学者来讨论这本珍贵的书籍？
I will read the book and see by myself.
仅仅公布发现并把书储存在我的图书馆里

A scholar working in my library, [the_whistleblower.GetTitledNameWithNick] is saying that my precious [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] is falsification!\n  I can imprison [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim], but on the other hand a courtier who speaks the truth might be a good person to have around me.
I will reward [the_whistleblower.GetHerHim] for speaking the truth!
This book seems to be a forgery!
After a careful reading of the [Root.GetBookTheme] that was supposedly written by [Root.GetAuthorName] I believe it is a forgery. Nevertheless, the contents of the book are actually not bad.
事实上我从这本书里学到了一些东西。

Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. The book was considered as a lost masterpiece and my court is famous now as a center of culture, scholarly debate and knowledge.

Many scholars accepted my invitation and gathered for several days discussing not only the book by [Root.GetAuthorName], but also other ancient knowledge. Unfortunately, after much discussion, the book was considered as a forgery, but my court is famous now as a center for scholarly debate, culture and knowledge.
A center for culture. That sounds good.
Good. And maybe next time I will actually obtain a masterpiece.

A book containing the lost [Root.GetBookTheme] by the famous [Root.GetAuthorNationAdj] [Root.GetAuthorTitle] [Root.GetAuthorName] was acquired and on this date a great meeting of scholars confirmed its authenticity. In those times, [wonder_province.GetName] was known as a place of culture, visited by scholars from afar.
建筑[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]的工人在挖掘过程中偶然发现了某种门，看起来似乎有一间密室。
我[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]工地上的监工刚刚报告我在挖掘过程中，一个工人跌进一个洞里，发现了一些骨头。看起来那是某种古老的坟墓。
让我们花点时间和金钱去研究一下
说不定里面有什么值钱的东西\n
别再让我为这种细枝末节的东西操心！
你不会再受到与奇观建筑过程中的发现有关的消息打扰。\n
可能是座古墓。小心探索。
这个选项可用是因为你拥有高学识或者是博学与建筑师特质。\n
工人们试图挖掘的时候发生了塌方，几个人被埋进了废墟里。现在我们得把所有东西清理干净。
挖了几天之后，找到的只有古人的遗骨与破碎的瓶瓶罐罐。我们的时间和金钱全部白费了。
经过一些挖掘，一块阻挡着入口的大石头出现了。当工人们移开石头时，他们发现了一座古墓，里面有少量的黄白之物。
工人们在[wonder_or_upgrade.GetName]施工现场地下找到了几间相连的墓室，里面有些被埋葬的古人的残余，还有数目可观的黄白之物！
工人们一路掘进一座巨大的墓室，里面安息着某位古代的领主。他们在里面找到了一些黄金制品，还有[found_artifact.GetName]。
如果不去给失去的工人留下的寡妇孤儿些许赔偿的话，我们将来有可能面临麻烦。\n
如果工人们什么都得不到的话。他们会很沮丧。\n
把黄金发给工人当作报酬吧！
我们会给遇难者的家人一些钱。
我们自己[the_armory.GetName]里的工匠已经足够了！
这个选项可用是因为你拥有包括§Y[the_armory.GetName]§!的§Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§!
The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was an armor you wanted right?" he adds.

My master [GetWeaponArmorSmith] came to see me in the throne room. [smith.GetSheHeCap] gestured towards [smith.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [smith.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
This sword can only be handled by a strong warrior, but is sure to impress friend and foe alike.
与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个合适的地点进行对话也许会使[Root.GetHerHim]更加支持我。

You will take §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! near the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! in your §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a talk with [target_character.GetHerHim] about the importance of cooperation.
过去的2年里没有威胁一名角色[From.GetScaryCD]

I invited [target_character.GetBestName] for a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, while [target_character.GetBestName] grew more and more uncomfortable, before I leaned in to say...

I invited [target_character.GetBestName] on a stroll today, saying I had something to show [target_character.GetHerHim]. Eventually we came to stop near my [target_upgrade.GetName]. I waited there in silence for several minutes, but [target_character.GetSheHe] seemed to be enjoying the view. Then I said...
...'I hope you understand how important this favor is'.
the attempt to coerce a favor fails
...'What do you think of my toy?'.
[target_character.GetBestName] just laughed at me! Laughed really hard. I can still hear his laughs in my dreams.
与§Y[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]§!在一个隐蔽的地方会面会很有趣。

You will invite §Y[target_character.GetFirstNameWithNick]§! to meet you in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§! and have a private conversation with [target_character.GetHerHim].
Has NOT invited a character for a private talk in the past §Y6§! months[From.GetSecludedCD]
[From.GetBestName] invited me to meet [From.GetHerHim] in the [target_upgrade.GetName] of the [target_wonder.GetName].
I will politely invent an excuse and refuse.
[target_character.GetBestName] accepted my invitation to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some time talking...
...we will know each other a little better.
I do not know how §Y[target_character.GetTitledFirstName]§! will react if I try to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but we might become lovers.
...I get my dagger out and try to stab [target_character.GetHerHim] in the heart.
This option is available because you have either a high §YIntrigue§! or related traits.\n
I better be good at fighting because §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! might resist my murder attempt.
[target_character.GetBestName] [target_character.GetPoliteRefuse] declined my invitation me to meet in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName] in the [target_wonder.GetName].
I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. We are having a pleasant conversation.
I think [From.GetBestName] was impressed with our conversation.
I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] grabs me and tries to kiss my mouth.
I get my dagger out and try to stab [From.GetHerHim] in the heart!
[target_character.GetFirstName] returned my kiss, and more. We became lovers.
I tried to kiss [target_character.GetHerHim], but [target_character.GetSheHe] recoiled from me with disgust and fear on [target_character.GetHerHis] face.

I went to meet [From.GetBestName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. After some pleasantries, [From.GetSheHe] pulls a dagger from under [From.GetHerHis] clothes and tries to stab me!
While I approach my face, suddenly [From.GetTitledFirstName] pulls a dagger from under [From.GetHerHis] clothes and tries to stab me!
you managing to escape, but wounded.
you being killed while trying to escape.
It was a very bad idea to go meet to meet [From.GetTitledFirstName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName]. I barely escaped with my life. My hands still tremble when I think of it.
Fortunately [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s dagger missed my heart, and I managed to escape with my life. The physician says I will survive. Let us see.

As I see the blood slowly leaving my body, forming a pool on the ground, and the hands of death reaching for me, I now think of all the things I could have done if I knew this day would end like this.
As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss my mark. Then [From.GetSheHe] just runs away. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.

As my dagger is going for [From.GetHerHis] heart, [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises the arm and I miss the mark. I wound [From.GetHerHim], but [From.GetSheHe] manages to run away, leaving a trail of blood behind. Now I will have to deal with the consequences.

Before [From.GetSheHe] can run away, I bury my dagger in [From.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetHerHisCap] face is frozen in a look of betrayal.
We fight each other, but in the end, I prevail and bury my dagger in [From.GetHerHis] chest! I leave [From.GetTitledFirstName] lying on the ground, a pool of blood forming around [From.GetHerHim].
After many years of tenaciously establishing new borders for our Empire, the time has come to officially declare ourselves the Tsardom of Russia. What a glorious day!
After many years of preparation, [From.GetBestName] has chosen to declare complete sovereignty over [From.GetHerHis] vast territories by founding the Tsardom of Russia.
Holding the Empire of Rus is not enough – some are starting to think that 'the Empire of Russia' has a better ring to it...
Lowers the requirements for upgrading Tribal Holdings to Castles

My [Root.GetLordLady], something has been found in the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage] a scribe catches up with me. "An old book, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]?" When I join [Root.GetHerHim] for a closer inspection, I have to agree with the assessment. "Old indeed", I sneeze. "We should have someone care for it", the scribe suggests.

Upon inspecting the [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage], my guards have found [inherited_artifact.GetName], an old weapon. "It must have belonged to [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", they inform me. "Shame it's not in better shape", they mutter.

I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName], a piece of armor, from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "I am not sure it's in any wearable condition, my [Root.GetLordLady]" the quartermaster informs me, as I trace the pattern on it with one hand.

I have recently inherited an item from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. "It has probably seen better days, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", the guard tells me, before continuing: "We are sorry to bother you with this, we just weren't sure whether to get rid of it or not".
I have recently inherited [inherited_artifact.GetName] from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It is not in good shape.
The [inherited_artifact.GetArtifactStorage] currently houses a valuable item I inherited from [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]. It might need someone to look after it though.

What is it? I ask the guards. "You have inherited this... [inherited_artifact.GetName]", one of them explains. "From [previous_owner.GetTitledFirstName]", [Root.GetSheHe] continues. "If you want to keep it, we'll store it for you, [Root.GetMasterMistress]. It might need some maintenance though."
I suppose it could be worth something, one day...
For sentimental reasons, I could have someone look it over.
Maintenance is to be expected, I guess.
We cannot put a price on heirlooms like this. Spare no expense!
We cannot afford to maintain all the old junk thrown our way.
A testament to the piety of its builder, the church stretches to the sky.
This building is a testament to the piousness of its builder.
Anyone setting foot in the building will be reminded of the value of a religious community.
The site of the temple is rumored to be the holiest ground in the realm.
A ruler is immortalized in this grand statue.
The fortress is a safe-haven, a home away from home for many warriors.
Partially carved from the very rock it sits on, only its owner knows exactly how far these tunnels sprawl.
A mega-project, this is a construction of massive city walls.
Heavily trafficked, the magnificent Harbor is bringing both trade and tourism to the area.
A tall and visible landmark, the building lends a helping hand to sailors, guiding their ships into port at night.
The epitome of high culture, the amphitheater is a unique attraction in the realm.
A regal symbol of the prestigious lineage of its builder, this palace is one of its kind.
The garden is a marvel of both science and beauty.
A high seat of learning, famous throughout the realm.
A simple tomb is not enough for some rulers.
Build it taller!, was apparently the last words of its architect.
Huge standing rocks are placed in a grand circle, with an opening towards the east, where the sun rises.
The strangely shaped pyramids have always been there.
The amphitheater has seen many uses throughout the centuries, including gladiatorial and animal fights, and later even serving as market stalls for city merchants.
One of the most beautiful cathedrals on this part of the map.
Some think the rocks were placed by gods. Others say it's pagan superstition, but refuse to go near them.
哈利卡那索斯的摩索拉斯陵墓
一座巨大的地上坟墓，由波斯帝国的一位总督摩索拉斯，为自己和卡里亚的阿尔特米西亚二世修建。
一座对犹太教徒而言及其神圣的山丘，据说是古代所罗门圣殿之所在。
这个灯塔很长一段时间里都是世界上最高的建筑，处在很远的地方也能见其高高耸立，同时它还一直保有着引船入港的功能。
The grand construction in the province has led to many well-connected roads being made in the realm.
A network of watchtowers and garrisons has been founded across the realm.
The armaments surrounding the grand construction display a collection of heads on spikes.
Tends to inspire characters to become §YCruel§!
The tower can be seen from far away.
From an underground furnace, through ducts and vents, warm air is guided through the building.
A complex system of pipes and hot water keeps the floor of the building warm.
A special unit of guards are stationed in the province, heightening security around the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
这些从[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]正面探出头的丑陋怪物看起来很不吉利。
While intended for ceremony, the bells can also be rung in times of danger, a warning which would be heard all over the province.
A beautiful piece of art reflecting a biblical scene.
The arch-headed windows extend to several floors, bestowing the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] with an unparalleled level of grandeur.
While subterranean passageways are a source of fascination, they are primarily a sacred space for religious practice.
On top of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a big cross, embellishing the silhouette of the building.
The bells of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] have been coated with a thin layer of gold.
The grand statue of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] impresses both faithful and those foreign to the faith of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] guards are especially dedicated to the protection of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
The people of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] show their devotion to the gods by sacrificing living beings.
In the middle of the grove, a tree is planted. As time passes, its branches will reach as tall as its roots, representing the connection between worlds.
A secluded series of rooms the Priests and Priestesses can retire to while maintaining communication with the Gods.

An area surrounding the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] has been dedicated to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], and contains smaller buildings and open spaces specifically designed to invite a larger number of worshipers.
一座[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]附带的高塔，用以召唤信众礼拜。
一个带喷泉的开放庭院，以供信众沐浴净身和透气。
礼拜墙顶端的圆顶，是苍穹的具象化。

Illumination is essential in a [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], as many prayers happen during the night. Hundreds of decorated lamps create a dazzling effect, with a soft light emanating from each one.
[FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]不仅可以进行礼拜，同时也是照顾穷困的人的市民中心。
The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
一座在疲惫的旅人间渐渐获得口碑的客栈。
The Talmud instructs that the Synagogue should be taller than the other buildings.
By building an outer garden, the faithful can relax before and after the prayers.
妥拉柜是存放神圣的妥拉经卷的柜子，意义重大。
Elaborate decorations will help elevate the spirit of the faithful to the heavens.
The acoustics of these rooms make them suited for practice singing.
The [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is also a place of learning.
An extensive library, for housing relevant manuscripts while also providing a quiet study area for the scholar in need of it.
The sun reflects most brilliantly in the surface of this statue.
The moon reflects beautifully in the surface of this statue.
These beautiful statues are said to resemble the immediate family of [Root.GetTitledName].
A stable containing horses, but most importantly, the ones descending from the original chosen creature depicted in the grand monument rising above the roof of this building.
The original statue is surrounded by smaller statues, depicting critters of various kinds.
The piers expand the harbor and how much trade that can be conducted there.
The installation of a proper Harbor office has led to better control of the trade coming and going through the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
For guiding ships in and out of the harbor.
An area set aside for construction of the navy.
The long-gone relatives of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can be found standing witness to the passing of time, in the dark corridors of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap].
A massive undertaking allowing the stage to be filled with water for mock naval battles.
Allows for battles with exotic beasts, imported from distant lands.
圆形剧场的附带建筑，用于赛马。
An academy to train the fighters who fight in the amphitheater
A place for chariots to practice and race each other.
A stage, specifically designed for dramatic readings of poetry and acting.
Beautiful fountains, attracting small birds, adding to the atmosphere.
这个井中的水闪烁着怪异的光泽......
A marvelous terraced solution to one section of the garden.
A place for hiding. Or romance.
The sweet smell of flowers and thick undergrowth can hide the darkest of secrets...
Delightful, but deadly, the flowers in this garden carry some powerful properties.
A well-organized patch of land, showing the dedication of its carer.
These elegant statues depict people relaxing, presumably to inspire calm in anyone visiting the garden.
The crown has begun to reserve choice areas and the finest forests in the land for royal hunting trips. Though some grumble, this is widely seen to be simply the monarch's due.
More than mere hunting preserves, these lands are the private playground of the monarch, and include valuable economic areas.

Entire towns are subsumed by this kingdom-within-a-kingdom, and prosperous villages often find that the monarch's men have "discovered" maps placing their settlements firmly inside the nearest royal forest.
皇家狩猎场现在占了全国的三分之一，比领主、市民和神职人员的地都多，也比君王自己其他所有的直辖领地加起来都多。这真成了国家的第四等级了。
一大片区域被划归成王室猎场，当地农民被清扫得一干二净，如同一片新的森林一般。
一个为皇家狩猎场单独设立的法律系统，必要的时候会取代当地的普通法。
法律只有通过制度的保证才能生效，现在皇家狩猎场拥有了一整套包括法院、看守、书记的制度，在训练有素的治安法官的支持下，他们随时准备着执行王室的法令。
皇家狩猎场内的居民对当地的矿藏有权开采，他们可以此免于服役。
Royal metalworks, royal armories, royal shipwrights, royal carpentries. If it's skilled and in the kingwoods, it belongs to the crown.
Reserve and cultivate ship-building timber for sale to your merchants, with the proviso that ships owe a certain amount of service to their lord.
Establish a ministry that regularly beats the bounds of the royal forests, determining exactly where the edges lay, and pushing them outwards every now and then.
Legalize small freeholders to patrol the borders of the kingwoods, in exchange for plots of land from which they can do it.
Agisters regulate both agistment and pannage, two of the major money-making abrogations for a royal forest. The organizations is not entirely unlike an extra layer of tax stations.
王室特权的扩张是以牺牲民众利益为代价的，民众对王室有了一定程度的非议，导致了一些轻微违反王室猎场法的负面事件出现。
王室特权无度的扩张继续激怒着赖这片土地维生的人，这造成了些更为严重的负面事件。
随着皇家狩猎场新近的扩大，王室获得了空前的势力。农民、神职人员和贵族们都不约而同地察觉到了这是绝对君主制诞生的开始，对此他们非常恼怒。一场戏剧性的叛乱定将接踵而至。
过去戏剧性的叛乱确实随着《大宪章》的签署彻底结束了。
An expansion to the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], providing ample storage for armor and weaponry.
A tower increasing the line of sight, and safety, for the entire province.
A special vault, deep in the heart of the fortress, for storage and safe-keeping.
A deep trench surrounds this fortress.
At least one craftsman died in the making of this moat.
Water keeps people at bay. Unless they can swim.
A frightening sight, the moat is said to contain all that remains of those who have personally slighted [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
A labyrinthine network of tunnels and passageways are said to exist within and under the walls of [FromFrom.GetName].
Within the walls of the fortress is a small and tranquil garden, serving as a place for the world-weary warrior to recharge his energy.
A room dedicated to the practice of one-on-one combat.
A secret vault, for storing particularly valuable merchandise.
A reinforced building structure, designed to prevent damage from earthquakes.
There can be no doubt as to who is the owner of this building.
A marvel of engineering, this flame is bigger and lasts longer than others.
There is one person who is ultimately in charge of the lighthouse maintenance. At least on paper.
In case of an important guest, the Royal Apartments will provide the level of comfort expected by any sophisticated ruler.
A series of impressive natural hollows, these rooms are only partially improved upon by human engineering.
These tunnels are hard to navigate, but those with the necessary maps are high-ranking soldiers in need of expedient travel.
In the depths of the underground complex, workers have encountered valuable ore, which is now being carefully excavated.
A wooden floor hatch, conveniently located right in front of the royal throne, sends a message to any belligerent visitor.
In memory of beloved family members, the stones show intricate patterns and markings, inspiring deep respect for its craftsmen.
These works reveal the human soul, the meaning of love, and the tragedy of life.
The secrets of building great edifices, roads, and bridges are revealed in the classical works of Vitruvius and other recent authors.
Manuscripts recording the known history of modern civilization and warfare.
By reading what many others observed of the world and creatures that live in it we may gain precious knowledge. Is the world actually flat?
From the works of Plato, to the most recent treatises on mathematics.
A room full of scribes, who receive works from all over the world and make copies of them.
Outside of the main [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] two smaller, yet similar, monuments can be found. They are said to be resting place of the ones most dear to [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Perhaps a monument to [Root.GetTitledName] [Root.GetHerselfHimself], the statue is mostly reminiscent of a famous beast.
These rooms do not appear to be a part of the original plans for the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap]...
Within the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap], surrounded by silence and the passing of time, there is a whole underground city for the dead.
Considering the pyramid is a lot like a giant sign proclaiming where to find valuables, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is rumored to have designed a number of intricate traps to scare off grave-robbers.
The surface of this pyramid is exceptionally smooth, and when it reflects the sun, it sometimes looks like it is emitting a light of its own.
Two gigantic Cherubim made out of cedar wood, their outstretched wings touching in the middle of the Holy Place.
The outer court is used by the population for worship
as long as anyone can remember
inspired many pious men and women
eased the burden of every day life for countless people
improved the lives of its residents
encouraged greatness in both commoner and noble alike
[This.GetName] sends chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
[This.GetName] send chills down the spine of even the bravest of souls
[This.GetName] promises safety in times of need
[This.GetName] are said to guarantee its safety, in times of need
stone [This.GetName] are said to keep demons at bay
grand dome is a second sky for its worshipers

The [target_wonder.GetName] has become a center for travelers and commerce, and some people have decided to settle close to the [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction. The latest reports mention children, dogs, and cattle — they are obviously putting down deep roots.
They are welcome to stay in [target_province.GetName]!
Drive out the rabble and confiscate their possessions!

My scribes have been frequenting the [target_wonder.GetName] during their toil to finish my book. As they present me with a new extract it is clear that it has been a great help – the quality of the text is beyond reproach!
My scribes will shine with this [target_wonder.GetWonderAdj] construction's help!
You encourage your scribes to use the [target_wonder.GetName], guaranteeing a better quality of work
Drink from the Fountain of Youth
The life-giving waters of the fountain is said to be able to wash away the effects of aging in anyone who drinks it.
Drank too recently — cannot drink it again until §Y[Root.drank_from_fountain_cooldown.GetExpiryDate]§!
Unlocks the §YDrink from the Fountain of Youth§! decision

I jump into the [target_wonder.GetName], laughing with glee, and I am soon choking on the life-giving water as I swallow mouthful after mouthful. As I drag myself up onto the ledge with shaking arms I soon stop smiling...
The years fall off me as I drink.
I've never felt this old before!
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves responsible and can be entrusted with the care of your lighthouse – keeping it both lit and functioning.
Steady as a rock, and with immovable discipline, the custodian is responsible for the care of the stones.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Stone§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown themselves steadfast in their loyalty and discipline.
The colossal monoliths of this construction already inspire both awe and admiration – imagine the impact of even more stones!
A crown made of pure gold encircles the magnificent head of the statue.
Anyone seeking passage through this area will be sternly encouraged to donate a small sum to the crown.
A dedicated place for your beloved horses to rest forever more.
A quiet and serene place for all pets to find eternal rest.

不想死的话就别问太多问题
用骷髅与白骨堆砌成的王座，以铁架支撑。
通体由黄金打造的宝座，甚至没有镀金，就是纯金打造。真是浪费啊。
一间能让你自行生产酒的酿酒厂。尽管它不太可能赢利，却可以使你变得受欢迎。
将你酿酒厂里生产的一[GetAlcoholContainerType][GetAlcoholType]赠予[Root.GetTitledFirstName]作为礼物
[From.GetTitledFirstName]最近并没有送过酒水类礼物
种葡萄并用葡萄酿酒的地方
An incredibly ostentatious bedroom, fit for nobility.
描绘着你家族历史中一幕的壁画
The Eternal Flame is constantly tended, to ensure it never goes out.
我们不清楚这是谁的墓地，但据传言，你有时能听见从里面传出声音。
改革尊日神教信徒好感
这座雕像表现了四匹马拉着一辆战车。
乔达摩·悉达多在这棵圣树的祖先的树荫下悟道，他是以佛陀之名为世人所知的精神导师。
佛教僧侣栖身立命之所。
这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。
这是佛陀及其弟子的遗物埋葬的地方。
为纪念佛陀及其弟子的生平事迹而建造。
Walls specifically added to defend from sea attacks.

The city's defenses have begun to spill out onto the land, with ropes of well-maintained walls crisscrossing the main approach to the burgh. Adding extra bastions to these will bulge the amount of walkable perimeter (and so how many troops can man them) without noticeably increasing cost.

A city is nothing without its countryside, and this city takes that seriously. Vital local townships are now guarded by their own fortifications, paid for and maintained by the capital-settlement, and the closest are even connected by short walls to form a single, defensible sprawl.

These dire, imposing stoneworks punch upwards like massive, artificial fists. Crowned with rows of bastions and studded with fortified towers, none may approach without being seen, and no amount of lesser walls captured will stop the enfilading from their legions of archers.

Secreted behind sewer shafts, diving under the moats, cut into the side of obscuring bastions: the defenders of this city strike often and without warning from their many and varied hiding places, before vanishing back into the night.
Turn each gatehouse into a full-scale fortress in its own right, and so turn each layer of the walls into a separate mini-siege.

Planned routes through the defenses that are simple, clear, devoid of cover, and looked over by the maximum possible number of defenses, always with a difficult fortress guarding the next killing ground along.
Adapt and reshape areas of the defenses to be especially vulnerable to attack from the next layer, turning losses for the defenders into massacres for the attackers.
Redirect local rivers and channel defensive islands out of the sea itself, adding a naval element to any siege that few attackers are equipped to deal with.
Allows more options when §YFinding a Smith§!.
Bells that once stood on a Christian Cathedral.
A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God.
A temple that symbolizes the house, seat and body of a God. It is a sign of its builder §YKarma§! and §YPrestige§!, and can also influence the opinion of some of your subjects.
An richly ornate high tower that serves as an entrance to the temple.
A great pillared hall serving as the waiting room for pilgrims and devotees.
A complex of smaller temples, surrounding the main temple.
A school, that also provides lodging for students and scholars.
A hospital attached to the temple.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its bells can even warn the people of danger.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can help convert the infidels to the true faith, improve opinion, or even help protect the population from diseases.
A testament to the §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§! of its builder, it can also help improve opinion of you, the morale of the military forces, and reduce revolt risk.
A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder, the temple can improve your subjects' opinion of you, and lower revolt risk.
A testament to the §YKarma§! of its builder, it can be used to store relics, and in times of trouble its walls can protect the people from danger.
Immortalizing a ruler in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from your family and vassals.
Immortalizing a horse in a grand statue is a testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, and can improve the opinion from horse loving vassals.
An imposing construction, it will make the province much harder to conquer. Added Facilities can improve considerably the military capabilities of its owner.
Building an underground city can increase your intrigue capabilities and you can even find a precious metal deposit.
The construction of massive city walls and other defensive structures will surely protect the province against besieging enemy armies.
A Great Harbor with storehouses will dominate trade in the area, thus bringing revenues. It can also increase our maritime military capabilities, including in sieges.
Illuminating the darkness and guiding ships to the safety of your port, the Lighthouse can increase trade and tax revenues. It can even be used as a place for you to rest.
An epitome of popular culture, it serves to entertain with great spectacles, lowering the revolt risk. It can also allow for the recruitment of specially trained individuals.
A regal symbol of the Prestigious lineage of its builder, it can also be equipped with a number of facilities that help the builder with their love life or court intrigue.
The garden will be a marvel of both science and beauty, and can help you with matters related to §YHealth§!, love life, or even intrigue.
A great place of learning will help with §YCultural§! and other technological advances. The presence of so many learned persons can even increase your personal §YSkills§!.
A place to collect, store and reproduce the great written works, it will allow you to find and use many books.
A testament to the §YPrestige§! of its builder and their successors, it is a place to honor the dead. It can also be used to intimidate friends and foes alike.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help improve opinion of you and even help protect your treasures.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can also help  improve your subjects's opinion of you.
A testament to your §YPiety§! and §YPrestige§!, it can help  improve opinion of you, help protect your treasures, and can even be used for sacrifices to the Gods.
Refused to Honor a Hated Ruler
...I kiss [target_character.GetHerHim] passionately and start taking [target_character.GetHerHis] clothes off.
I went to meet [From.GetFirstName] in the seclusion of the [target_upgrade.GetName], in the [target_wonder.GetName]. [From.GetSheHe] kissed me passionately, and we had a good tumble.

The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in the company of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], or maybe in the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. And thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have the ability to properly honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in death.

The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in Heaven in the company of the saints and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], or maybe in Hell in the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].

The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead. Maybe he is in Jannah accompanied by the Houris, or maybe in Jahannam suffering the company of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].

The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead, waiting the end of times. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body may be put to rest in the [target_wonder.GetName].

The great [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] is dead, [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHis] soul awaiting rebirth in the great cycle of life. But here on this land I must decide on how to honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim]. And thanks to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have the ability to properly honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in death.
I will commit [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] to earth in a ceremony that shall be remembered!
You invite all people to come and pay homage to §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]§! in a grandiose ceremony.
The people will know I respect the dead!
You organize a traditional ceremony and invite all the powerful vassals to attend.
I will honor [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] in a private ceremony.
[target_dead_ruler.GetFirstNameWithNick] does not deserve a proper burial!
Those who liked §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§! are upset with you. Those who hated [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] are pleased.

It was a great Feast in the honor of [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName] and the Gods. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body now rests in peace in the [target_wonder.GetName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].

It was a memorable funeral and procession full of honors for [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]. [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHisCap] body now rests in peace in the [target_wonder.GetName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].
It was a memorable funeral and procession full of honors for [target_dead_ruler.GetTitledName]. Everybody will remember how I honored [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim].
Those who liked §Y[target_dead_ruler.GetBestName]§! improve their opinion of you.[Root.GetBigBurialHaterSentence]
Those who hated [target_dead_ruler.GetHerHim] might not be pleased.
You can store a §Yrelic§! in one of your great works.
You can store a relic, like the §Y[target_artifact_1.GetName]§!, in the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.

You spend many hours contemplating the wondrous [target_artifact_1.GetName] in your possession. Surely a fitting place for such a relic would be the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.

You spend many hours contemplating the wondrous [target_artifact_1.GetName] and the holy [target_artifact_2.GetName] in your possession. A fitting place to keep one of the relics would be the §Y[target_upgrade.GetName]§! of the §Y[target_wonder.GetName]§!.

Suddenly everything goes dark, and a powerful voice echoes in your head: 'What have you done?' Then you feel pain as lightning strikes you, and the world around you dissolves. Your last thoughts are...
I hope my successor does not do the same mistake.
All walls of the province's holdings will be upgraded to their maximum level.
Defenders will have more chances of actively resisting sieges.

The last fortifications of the [target_upgrade.GetName] for mine [target_wonder.GetName] have been finally finished. Now, even the small townships in the province of [target_province.GetName] are protected by these great defensive works!
All walls of [target_province.GetName] holdings are upgraded to their maximum level.

Thank you, I accept this offer gladly.
I thank you, but you can keep it to yourself.

I post guards so that nobody interferes.

This construction has been almost completely destroyed, looted for anything of value, and is now but a shadow of its former glory.
Lively conversations, flowing drinks, and a warm fire – there is no better place to relax after a long day!

Warm light, accompanied by the lively murmur of conversation, spills out of the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] as [drinking_buddy.GetTitledName] and I walk past.\n\n"What do you say about a cup of something soothing?"
There might be consequences to this
I am more interested in continuing our discussion.

After my initial visit to the tavern close to the [target_wonder.GetName] I have not been able to keep away. More often than not I find myself seeking the comfort of a big cup of [GetAlcoholType] after a long day.
The retinue stationed in the [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!
The temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName] have helped me to round up and execute the robber bands that were plaguing §Y[Root.GetName]§!!

Thanks to the temple guards of [target_wonder.GetName], and my great diplomatic skill, the Smugglers' Ring in §Y[Root.GetName]§! has been destroyed. The head of the last smuggler is now rotting on a pike.

I kneel beside a fountain in the [target_wonder.GetName] and lower a cup into the water. As I drink deeply a tingling sensation spreads in my whole body, and I am left with energy and vigor I haven't felt in years!
May kill anyone who tries to conquer the [FromFrom.GetName]

While exploring the depths of the [target_wonder.GetName], both [target_courtier.GetTitledName] and [target_courtier_2.GetTitledName] were caught in one of the deadly traps spread within the structure. What we recovered was barely enough to recognize them by...

Word has reached me that the traps I installed in the depths of the [target_wonder.GetName] have claimed [target_courtier.GetTitledName] and [target_courtier_2.GetTitledName] as victims! Apparently they were both mangled almost past recognition.
With eyes downcast in vigilance, the Guardian of the Deep is as unmovable and eternal as the stones found in the depths.

The Watcher of Giants is responsible for the large statues in the area.
Unlocks the §YWatcher of Giants§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional vigilance and skills of observation, and they are ultimately responsible for the maintenance and upkeep of the great statue.
Constantly walking the wall, the Walker of the Wall is one of the few who knows it inside and out.

This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown diligence and can spend the majority of their day on their feet, inspecting and maintaining the wall.
Ultimately responsible for all things marine – every living soul in the Harbor answers to the Master of the Tides.
Unlocks the §YMaster of the Tides§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown aptitude for all things marine, and the overarching responsibility of the §YHarbor§! rests on their shoulders.
With a booming voice the Master of the Games can tease forth both cheers and tears, the whole §YAmphitheater§! is their stage and responsibility.
Unlocks the §YMaster of the Games§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person with a strong personality and presence, capable of bending a whole crowd to their will.
With nerves of steel and a will of iron the custodian maintains and develops the §YRoyal Palace§!.
This honorific is awarded to a person who has proven themselves dependable, and they are responsible for the upkeep and maintenance of the §YRoyal Palace§!.
Responsible for everything inside the §YUniversity's§! walls, this title brings with it both gravitas and responsibility.
Unlocks the §YGuardian of Knowledge§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown their wisdom and courage.
From old ledgers covered in dust to newly minted pages – all written text needs someone to care for it.
Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Tomes§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown great aptitude for learning and all related skills.
Appointed as the one responsible for the eternal rest of the dead in the mausoleum is the Keeper of the Dead.
Unlocks the §YKeeper of the Dead§! minor title
The Keeper of the Dead is responsible for the final rest of everyone placed in the §YMausoleum§!.
Appointed as the one with ultimate authority over all rites executed within the pyramid's walls the Overseer of Rites carry both authority and responsibility upon their shoulders.
Unlocks the §YOverseer of the Rites§! minor title
The Overseer of Rites is responsible for all rites and rituals related to the §YPyramid§!.
As the authority on all daily business and rituals, the Custodian of the Mosque is heeded by all.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Mosque§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].
As the authority on all daily business and rituals the Custodian of the Temple is heeded by all.
Unlocks the §YCustodian of the Temple§! minor title
This honorific is awarded to a person who has shown exceptional devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].

[target_vassal.GetTitledName], I want to express my admiration and satisfaction in your handling of the [target_wonder.GetName]!

Sincerely,
[target_liege.GetBestName]
It's all due to your guidance, my liege.
I have done good, haven't I!

My liege, the [target_wonder.GetName] is bringing prosperity and fame to the area, and I am grateful that you entrusted such a magnificent structure to my province.

Sincerely,
[target_vassal.GetBestName]
A piece of the [target_wonder.GetName] has fallen off – almost hitting a bystander in the head! Certain areas of the magnificent structure seem to be in dire need of upkeep.
Hm, I bet these pieces would fetch a decent price...

Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.

A sacred and reserved space inside the temple where only the high ranking priests can enter.
Two pillars of bronze frame the entrance to the temple, bidding all worshipers welcome.

Cherubim, palm trees, and open flowers, all overlaid with gold, are carved into the cedar-lined walls. The floor is of cypress overlaid with gold. The door posts, of olive wood, support folding doors of cypress.
The inner sanctuary within the temple. It is located in the westernmost end of the temple building, a perfect cube, prepared to contain the Ark of the Covenant.

The Inner Court, or Court of the Priests, is separated from the space beyond by a wall of three courses of hewn stone, surmounted by cedar beams. It contains the Altar of burnt-offering, the Brazen Sea laver, and ten other lavers.
A large hall where famous scholars can give public lectures, attracting many attendees.
The intricate arts of negotiation, rhetoric, and ultimately convincing others of where their best interests lie are taught and practiced here.
Here the classic works on history and ancient wars are taught and discussed, as well as old and new treatises on the art of warfare.
The principles of accounting, finance, and economics are taught here.
From what plants to use for making deadly concoctions to the art of cipher, all that a budding spy needs to know is taught here.
Here the foundations of logic and mathematics are taught, as well as physics, metaphysics, and the scriptures.
splendid [This.GetName] draw[This.GetSingularS] a lot of attention
